history.narrative: Law 19-248, the “911 Purity Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-139. The Bill was adopted on first reading on Nov. 15, 2012. Deemed approved without the signature of the Mayor on Dec. 21, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-578 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-248 became effective on Mar. 19, 2013.
